thread.title: 'It was unbelievable': Wade Nicholson-Doyle whose same-sex proposal wowed Adele
thread.title_full: 'It was unbelievable': Wade Nicholson-Doyle whose same-sex proposal wowed Adele

author: Broede Carmody
title: 'It was unbelievable': Wade Nicholson-Doyle whose same-sex proposal wowed Adele
text:
License article 'It was unbelievable': Wade Nicholson-Doyle whose same-sex proposal wowed Adele 
For Wade Nicholson-Doyle and his partner Chris, it was a magical experience - particularly after a difficult few months that saw their cafe burn down in September. twitter TWEET More 
The Melbourne man who popped the question in front of Adele and thousands of screaming fans over the weekend says the surprise engagement was an "unbelievable" experience that topped off a horrendous six months. 
The superstar herself was overcome with emotion when Wade Nicholson-Doyle followed his partner Chris up on stage before dropping onto one knee . Disney: The big mouse in the industry Play Video Surprise wedding proposal at Adele concert Surprise wedding proposal at Adele concert 
A concertgoer surprises everyone by proposing to his boyfriend after being invited up onto the stage by Adele. Vision: Today Show Nine Network . Up Next Disney: The big mouse in the industry Play Video Disney: The big mouse in the industry Disney: The big mouse in the industry 
Outstripping all other big movie studios in 2016, and looking set to repeat the success in 2017, how does Disney do it? Up Next Muppet with autism welcomed on 'Sesame Street' Play Video Muppet with autism welcomed on 'Sesame Street' 
'Sesame Street's' newest Muppet is Julia, a 4-year-old with blazing red hair, bright green eyes, and autism. Up Next Has Vanessa married her father? Play Video Has Vanessa married her father? Has Vanessa married her father? 
Vanessa confronts her father about his behaviour, noticing how similar he is to her Married at First Sight husband Andy. Vision: Nine Network Up Next Katy Perry 'prayed the gay away' Play Video Katy Perry 'prayed the gay away' 
The pop star recalls her struggle to reconcile her sexuality with her religious upbringing in "Jesus camps". Up Next 
Adele's first-ever Australian tour racked up some very big numbers and one or two unexpected moments. Up Next Tim Allen says he feels stigmatised in Hollywood Play Video Tim Allen says he feels stigmatised in ... Tim Allen says he feels stigmatised in Hollywood 
On his appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live , Tim Allen says being a conservative in Hollywood is like being in 1930s Germany. Up Next Entertainment news highlights Entertainment news highlights 
The death of a rock and roll pioneer, political parodies and people eating human brains are included in this week's highlights. More videos Surprise wedding proposal at Adele concert 
A concertgoer surprises everyone by proposing to his boyfriend after being invited up onto the stage by Adele. Vision: Today Show Nine Network . 
Speaking to Fairfax Media, Mr Nicholson-Doyle said ambushing his now-fianc√©e in front of one of the most famous performers in the world was an unforgettable experience, especially considering the challenges both of them have recently endured. 
"It was unbelievable," he said. "We'll never forget it." Related Content
